definitions.definition: To make (products or services) available for sale and promote them.
definitions.example: We plan to market an ecology model by next quarter.
We marketed more this quarter already than all last year!

definitions.definition: To deal in a market; to buy or sell; to make bargains for provisions or goods.
Buying and selling in a market.
The promotion, distribution and selling of a product or service; the work of a marketer; includes market research and advertising.
(up to the 1920s) Shopping, going to market.
